title: Unprefix and support all @viewport properties
body: CSS Device Adaption (http://dev.w3.org/csswg/css-device-adapt) is partially supported through the @-ms-viewport rule, however the width and height property are the only ones supported. It would be nice if the zoom and orientation properties were supported, too (in addition to the rest of the spec), so that we'd get a real replacement for the non-standard viewport <meta> tag.
